definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Semi-colons show a pause which is longer than a comma, but not as long as a full stop.
sentences.chinese: 分号表达的是一个比逗号长句号短的停顿。

sentences.english: Use a semicolon to separate each mode.
sentences.chinese: 使用分号来分开各个模式。

sentences.english: We always use per thousand sign to express a thousandth.
sentences.chinese: 我们总是用千分号表示千分数。

sentences.english: First, the use of semicolons and backslashes.
sentences.chinese: 首先是分号和反斜线的用法。

sentences.english: Using percent signs within variable names is not permitted.
sentences.chinese: 不允许在变量名内部使用百分号。

sentences.english: The linker ignores all text from the semicolon to the end of the line.
sentences.chinese: 链接器忽略从分号到行尾的所有文本。

sentences.english: The semicolons are where they could be or should be.
sentences.chinese: 这些分号放在它应该放的地方。

sentences.english: Many will be relieved to know that semicolons are also still optional.
sentences.chinese: 知道分号依然是可选的时候，许多人都会感到轻松。

sentences.english: Less than 40 per cent of businesses bother to check academic and professional qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 不足40百分号的企业会费心核查教育和职业资历。

sentences.english: Take out percent sign, move decimal points two places to the left.
sentences.chinese: 去掉百分号，小数点向左移动两位。

sentences.english: Multiple targets are separated by semicolons.
sentences.chinese: 多个目标之间用分号分隔。

sentences.english: Semicolons can also be used to separate the items in a list.
sentences.chinese: 分号可用来分割一系列中的各项。

sentences.english: In these cases, you can use semicolons to separate individual statements.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的情况下，可以使用分号来分隔单个语句。

sentences.english: Where more than one citation is given in a single footnote, separate them with semi-colons.
sentences.chinese: 在一个脚注中多于一个引证，用分号隔开。

sentences.english: If you want to use multiple attributes, separate them with a semicolon.
sentences.chinese: 如果想使用多个属性，可以用分号隔开它们。

sentences.english: Each subelement within the less-than and greater-than characters is separated with a semicolon.
sentences.chinese: 大于号和小于号内的每个子元素由分号分隔。

definition: money farm (dealing in illegal foreign currency of money laundering)
